title: Acid Arrow
description: Hurl a green arrow of acid at a target, dealing 4d4 acid damage upon hit, and 2d4 at the end of its next turn. On miss, target takes half initial damage with no additional damage.
desc: Hurl a green arrow of acid at a target, dealing 4d4 acid damage upon hit, and 2d4 at the end of its next turn. On miss, target takes half initial damage with no additional damage.

title: Acid Splash
description: Hurl a bubble of acid at one target within range, dealing 1d6 acid damage upon a failed Dexterity saving throw. Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th level, 3d6 at 11th level, and 4d6 at 17th level.
desc: Hurl a bubble of acid at one target within range, dealing 1d6 acid damage upon a failed Dexterity saving throw. Damage increases to 2d6 at 5th level, 3d6 at 11th level, and 4d6 at 17th level.

title: Aid
description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.
desc: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

title: Alarm
description: Alarm spell creates a protective ward on a door, window, or area up to 20ft. Get alerted if a creature enters. Choose mental or audible notification within 1 mile or 60ft range.
desc: Alarm spell creates a protective ward on a door, window, or area up to 20ft. Get alerted if a creature enters. Choose mental or audible notification within 1 mile or 60ft range.

title: Alter Self
description: Alter Self: Choose between Aquatic Adaptation (breathe underwater, gain swimming speed), Change Appearance (modify appearance without changing stats), or Natural Weapons (grow natural weapon dealing 1d6 damage with +1 bonus).
desc: Alter Self: Choose between Aquatic Adaptation (breathe underwater, gain swimming speed), Change Appearance (modify appearance without changing stats), or Natural Weapons (grow natural weapon dealing 1d6 damage with +1 bonus).

title: Animal Friendship
description: Charm a beast into believing you mean no harm; must be seen and heard, with Intelligence under 4. They make a saving throw; if charmed, ends if harmed by you or your companions.
desc: Charm a beast into believing you mean no harm; must be seen and heard, with Intelligence under 4. They make a saving throw; if charmed, ends if harmed by you or your companions.

title: Animal Messenger
description: Use a Tiny beast to send a message to a known location and recipient, traveling up to 50 miles per day. The beast delivers a 25-word message in your voice and returns if the spell ends before reaching its destination.
desc: Use a Tiny beast to send a message to a known location and recipient, traveling up to 50 miles per day. The beast delivers a 25-word message in your voice and returns if the spell ends before reaching its destination.

title: Animal Shapes
description: Polymorph spell transforms willing creatures into beasts with CR 4 or lower, changing their stats, retaining alignment and mental scores. They revert at 0 HP, excess damage carries over, limited actions in new form, gear merges but can't be used.
desc: Polymorph spell transforms willing creatures into beasts with CR 4 or lower, changing their stats, retaining alignment and mental scores. They revert at 0 HP, excess damage carries over, limited actions in new form, gear merges but can't be used.

title: Animate Dead
description: Animate Dead: Choose bones or corpse of Medium/Small humanoid, raising it as a skeleton or zombie. Control creature with bonus action within 60 ft for 24 hours; reassert control by recasting spell.
desc: Animate Dead: Choose bones or corpse of Medium/Small humanoid, raising it as a skeleton or zombie. Control creature with bonus action within 60 ft for 24 hours; reassert control by recasting spell.

title: Animate Objects
description: Animate Objects spell brings up to ten nonmagical objects to life under your control until defeated or the spell ends. You can command them mentally within 500 feet, each size category determines stats and attacks, and they revert to objects if re...
desc: Animate Objects spell brings up to ten nonmagical objects to life under your control until defeated or the spell ends. You can command them mentally within 500 feet, each size category determines stats and attacks, and they revert to objects if re...

title: Antilife Shell
description: Create a 10-foot radius barrier centered on you that blocks creatures other than undead and constructs. Affected creatures can't pass through but can attack or cast spells through it. Dispelled if creature forced through.
desc: Create a 10-foot radius barrier centered on you that blocks creatures other than undead and constructs. Affected creatures can't pass through but can attack or cast spells through it. Dispelled if creature forced through.

title: Antimagic Field
description: Antimagic Field creates a 10-foot-radius sphere around you where spells can't be cast, magical effects are suppressed, summoned creatures disappear, and magic items become mundane. It moves with you, nullifying spells and magical effects except th...
desc: Antimagic Field creates a 10-foot-radius sphere around you where spells can't be cast, magical effects are suppressed, summoned creatures disappear, and magic items become mundane. It moves with you, nullifying spells and magical effects except th...

title: Antipathy/Sympathy
description: Antipathy/Sympathy: Choose a creature type and a 200-foot cube area. Creatures must save or feel compelled to avoid (Antipathy) or approach (Sympathy) the target. They can save again every 24 hours for potential immunity.
desc: Antipathy/Sympathy: Choose a creature type and a 200-foot cube area. Creatures must save or feel compelled to avoid (Antipathy) or approach (Sympathy) the target. They can save again every 24 hours for potential immunity.

title: Arcane Eye
description: Create an invisible eye within range, it hovers and you see through it. Move it 30 feet in any direction. No range limit but can't enter another plane. Can pass through openings as small as 1 inch.
desc: Create an invisible eye within range, it hovers and you see through it. Move it 30 feet in any direction. No range limit but can't enter another plane. Can pass through openings as small as 1 inch.

title: Arcane Hand
description: Create a Large hand of force that mimics your movements. It has AC 20, hit points equal to yours, and can move 60 feet. Choose from Clenched Fist (4d8 force damage), Forceful Hand (push or grapple), or Interposing Hand (provides half cover
desc: Create a Large hand of force that mimics your movements. It has AC 20, hit points equal to yours, and can move 60 feet. Choose from Clenched Fist (4d8 force damage), Forceful Hand (push or grapple), or Interposing Hand (provides half cover
